title: Patch Notes
content: g DLAA when FSR 2.0's 'Ultra Performance' was enabled would cause the output image to jitter and have incorrect colours. DLAA: Fixed an issue where enabling DLAA when the sharpness slider was set to a high value (>0.5) would cause the output image to be over-sharpened. Now, when DLAA is enabled, the sharpness slider and value are set to a safe default value that does not cause an over-sharpened image. DLSS & DLAA: Slightly improved performance when changing any DLSS- or DLAA-related settings. Fi
